thread.section_title: Hotel Monge - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Customer Service
thread.title_full: Excellent Customer Service - Review of Hotel Monge, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Meeshy34
title: Excellent Customer Service
text:
I actually didn't stay here.
My friend stayed here and left valuables in the safe. They informed her that she left them and that they would FedEx it back to her. My husband and I happened to be in Paris at the time and were able to pick it up for her.
From the short time we were there, we liked how neat and clean it was. It's located in the 5h and is close to many restaurants and attractions. The front desk staff was warm and inviting when we arrived.
We were amazed at how helpful that staff was throughout the situation. It's rare to find honest people now a days, and just goes to show how great this hotel is. Thank you so much!
